short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve functionality in the Jira issue filter screens

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Build quick filters by drag and drop fields from the result table itself (assignee, reporter, priority, isssueType) or by clicking on them (status)
Easily export your filter as list of Jira so you can easily share a link with your team with the specific link in the page.
